item.title: The University of Texas at Austin
item.subtitle: B.S.A. Honors, Computer Science, May 2018 (expected)
item.text: Polymathic Scholar (Interdisciplinary Honors). Bridging Disciplines Program, Digital Media and Arts certificate. Classes: Reinforcement Learning, Autonomous Intelligent Robotics I & II, Operating Systems Honors, Embedded Systems, Computer Graphics.

item.title: Building Wide Intelligence research group
item.subtitle: Undergraduate Researcher
item.text: Worked with other undergraduates and faculty mentors. Implemented novel transfer learning method for reinforcement learning agents in the Block Dude domain. Coauthored a submission to AAAI.

item.title: USAA
item.subtitle: Research Engineer Intern
item.text: Worked alone and with teams in areas of natural language and brain computer interface. Designed and developed prototypes and presented them to leaders. Co-inventor on two provisional patent applications.

item.title: MAD
item.subtitle: MAD Labs Director
item.text: Taught intro iOS workshops. Organized teams of students to work on applications for the community. Led efforts to revitalize departmental iOS app.

item.title: Pulsar
item.subtitle: Developer
item.text: Developed an iOS metronome app with gorgeous custom UI. Distributed on the App Store.

item.title: TickTock
item.subtitle: Developer
item.text: Created an Arduino alarm clock with Bluetooth Low Energy communication and a companion iOS app. Researched components and designed a custom PCB. Documented research into low cost peripheral development and published it online using GitHub.

item.title: Forecast.io Dashboard Widget
item.subtitle: Web Developer
item.text: Created and maintained an open source weather embed. Took requests and facilitated discussion from multiple contributors using GitHub.

item.title: Autonomous Intelligent Robotics research stream Peer Mentor
Foilist
item.text: Multiple national appearances. B rating in foil.

item.title: Violinist
item.text: Played with Engineering Chamber Orchestra in college.
